text:
You are analyzing how this service integrates with the broader Content Workforce system.

Your task: Analyze integration points with other services (Task #5).

Working directory: /Users/georgewestbrook/Programming/novosapien/ns-content-workforce/ns-content-workforce-idea-agents

Focus on:
- Backend API integration contracts (in CLAUDE.md)
- Expected API endpoint and routes
- Input data structure from Backend API
- Output format requirements
- Relationship to Supabase database (check ../ns-content-workforce-api/ for models)
- Inngest workflow integration

Also review the parent CLAUDE.md at /Users/georgewestbrook/Programming/novosapien/ns-content-workforce/CLAUDE.md for system-wide context.

When complete:
1. Update Task #5 to "completed" status
2. Send a message to team-lead with your findings about integration contracts
